title: endappaDi AnAlum sollik-koLLaDi
sahitya:
endappaDi AnAlum sollik-koLLaDi mAnE enakkadu inbam tAnE 
innishaiyODu kuzhalUdi mADOTTi engum tirinda ayyanaiyum 
ennuLam koNDa vandilai enru enrum arinda ennaiyum shErttu


anupallavi

  anda mighu shUDum nanda kumaAranaiyum 
indapaDi uravADum endanaiyum sErttuk-koNDu


caraNam    ArukkellAm accappaDa vENumA avar kUDa aDimaiyum AnArenrAll shollat-tONumO
perukkenra shAstiramum perum perum purANamum ayyan perumaiyaik-kETTirundum 
Urukkadu nItiyAnAl unakkEduvAyO nI oruttarum tuNai illaiyEl pidaTrik-koLvAyO 
shArillAda pEikkarumbai shakkarai enbyO svmi manam terindAl tAmasam sheivAyO
